c:facetType.name: Plot2ChartOptionsFacet
c:facetType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the plot2 facet.

c:property.name: plot2
c:property.c:documentation:
Activates the second plot.
The series identified in are plotted in the second plot.
The second plot is a generic point plot, which means that its properties , , , and
can be set freely.
By default, the second plot shows lines and dots/markers.

c:property.name: plot2Series
c:property.c:documentation:
The key values of the series visual role, that are to be shown in the second plot.
If the series visual role has more than one dimension, the specified keys should be the result of joining the key of each dimension with a "~" character.
This option is only relevant when the property has the value true.

c:property.name: color2AxisColors
c:property.c:documentation:
The discrete colors scheme to use to distinguish visual elements that are colored using the second color axis.
With a few exceptions, color axes map values of the "color" visual role.

c:facetType.name: ChartPlot2V1OptionsFacet
c:facetType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the plot2 V1 facet.
Contains the additional plot2 related options of V1, only supported by the chart types that had them then.

c:property.name: secondAxis
c:property.c:documentation: Use instead. Indicates whether selected series are plotted in a separate plot.

c:property.name: showSecondScale
c:property.c:documentation:
Use , of the ortho2 axis, instead.
Indicates whether the second orthogonal axis panel is shown.

c:property.name: secondAxisIdx
c:property.c:documentation:
Use instead. The zero-based indexes of the series, in the order of appearance in the data source, that are to be shown in the second axis, on chart types that support it.
A negative index designates an index from the last series. So -1 is the last series, -2 is the next-to-last series, etc.

c:property.name: secondAxisColor
c:property.c:documentation: Use instead. The discrete colors scheme to use to distinguish visual elements that are colored using the second color axis.

c:property.name: secondAxisIndependentScale
c:property.c:documentation: Use instead, to specify an alternate orthogonal axis. Indicates whether the secondary axis should be shown and with an independent range.
